content: a pattern for a pair of adult female sized fingerless mittens using a yummy textured lemon peel stitch free pattern available at https //burgundyandblush co uk/lily-lemon-peel-mittens-pattern/ materials <100g of an aran or worsted weight yarn recommend wi soft & smooth 4 5mm hook scissors and needle for finishing concentration level simple stitches and beginner friendly a good place to start with mittens as the texture is forgiving of mistakes
